testcase.name: Hepsiburada outdoor ayakkabi satın alma testi
testcase.system-out: Given "Hesabim ikonuna" tiklanir............................................passed And "email" yazilir.........................................................passed Then "login giris yap" tiklanir.............................................passed And "sifre" yazilir.........................................................passed And "giris yap" tiklanir....................................................passed And "tamam" tiklanir........................................................passed And "carpi simgesi" kategori var ise tiklanir.passed Then Outdoor giyim ayakkabi kategorisi tiklanir.............................passed And "Outdoor Bot" için sayfa taranir ve kategori var ise tiklanir...........passed And "filtrele" tiklanir.....................................................passed Then "cinsiyet" tiklanir....................................................passed Then "fiyat araligi" tiklanir...............................................passed And "En az fiyat" yazilir...................................................passed And "En cok fiyat"
